blog.name: carnivaleroses
blog.title: Carnival Roses
blog.description:
Dawn Eldridge. 
She/They. 
Freelance Digital Artist. 
Professionally Weird.
Only slightly crazy.
I'm a new digital artist but I've been creating art my whole life. My favorite art subjects are fantasy and dungeons & dragons. Storytelling is the heart of all that I love. I paint or original concepts as well as a lot of Critical fan art. 
I drink absurd amounts of tea, eat too much chocolate, and devour entire boxes of white cheddar cheezits whole. The circus rose is actually my favorite flower and not because of its name.

summary: “Amidst the Storm”   Yasha’s been getting a lot of attention lately and I’m living for it. I can’t wait to see what happens in...
caption:
“Amidst the Storm” 

Yasha’s been getting a lot of attention lately and I’m living for it. I can’t wait to see what happens in the upcoming episodes. This started as a traditional drawing that I decided to paint over.

blog.name: disasterjones
blog.title: five kobolds in a hooded cloak
blog.description:
"Am I being Fjorded?"

dizzie/doo/jonesy • they/them • follows and likes from deedeedoozle • CR spoilers: #crs • currently watching: cs2e67


[icon: Marisha Ray on the set of Talks Machina, seated on the couch. She has both arms at her sides and one leg propped up on the opposite knee, making a face as if to say, "Is it tho?"
//
header: A black and white gif of Travis Willingham and Marisha Ray on the set of Talks Machina. He reaches forward and picks up a drink, laughing and preparing to take a sip. She is laughing loudly, clapping and stomping her feet as she teeters sidways.]

tags: does anybody else get the feeling that sam's natural go-to dance is the carlton
summary: Guard: Unfortunately, ah, we were doing much better until we had to divide some of our forces to the west to deal with... the...
body:
Guard: Unfortunately, ah, we were doing much better until we had to divide some of our forces to the west to deal with… the Empire.

Mercer: And he kind of looks past you [Fjord] to the cluster of the rest of your group a little ways off to the side.

Guard: So we’re doing the best with what we have.

Laura, starting to dance: I’m doing the cabbage patch.

Caduceus, watching Jester, disguised as a giant leaf, doing the cabbage patch: That’s a funky pea.

Travis: I peek over my shoulder at the group, see Jester doing the fuckin cabbage patch. I’m like,

Fjord: They might not look like much, but we’re here to help.

Nott: [rhythmic hype noises]

Fjord: Most of us are here to help.

Caduceus: [waving both arms over his head, swaying back and forth]

Caleb: [starts doing the sprinkler]

Fjord, witnessing the bubbly tiefling in the snap pea outfit, the clueless firbolg that turns dead people to mushrooms, and the world’s saddest wizard all dancing like it’s 1983: Some of us are here to help.

Fjord: They might not look like much, but we’re here to help.

Caleb: [starts doing the sprinkler]

Fjord, witnessing the bubbly tiefling in the snap pea outfit, the clueless firbolg that turns dead people to mushrooms, and the world’s saddest wizard all dancing like it’s 1983: Some of us are here to help.

Mercer: And he kind of looks past you [Fjord] to the cluster of the rest of your group a little ways off to the side.

Fjord: They might not look like much, but we’re here to help.

Nott: [rhythmic hype noises]

Fjord: Most of us are here to help.

Caduceus: [waving both arms over his head, swaying back and forth]

Caleb: [starts doing the sprinkler]

Fjord, witnessing the bubbly tiefling in the snap pea outfit, the clueless firbolg that turns dead people to mushrooms, and the world’s saddest wizard all dancing like it’s 1983: Some of us are here to help.

summary: Matt Mercer looks so much like he should be a real life elf. There are times during CR where I'll be looking at his face and...
body: Matt Mercer looks so much like he should be a real life elf. There are times during CR where I’ll be looking at his face and he’ll turn his head to the side and I’m surprised to see his ears are still round, not pointed like an elf’s. What is this witchery.

reblog.comment: Matt Mercer looks so much like he should be a real life elf. There are times during CR where I’ll be looking at his face and he’ll turn his head to the side and I’m surprised to see his ears are still round, not pointed like an elf’s. What is this witchery.

trail.content_raw: Matt Mercer looks so much like he should be a real life elf. There are times during CR where I’ll be looking at his face and he’ll turn his head to the side and I’m surprised to see his ears are still round, not pointed like an elf’s. What is this witchery.
trail.content: Matt Mercer looks so much like he should be a real life elf. There are times during CR where I’ll be looking at his face and he’ll turn his head to the side and I’m surprised to see his ears are still round, not pointed like an elf’s. What is this witchery.

tags: i think this is the first tarot spread im posting that i made
some of these are really weirdly phrased because english is hard
summary:
1. Fjord: How can you learn more about yourself?
2. Caleb: Which regrets do you need to overcome?
3. Nott: What do you want to...
body:
Mighty Nein Tarot Spread

1. Fjord: How can you learn more about yourself?

2. Caleb: Which regrets do you need to overcome?

3. Nott: What do you want to protect?

4. Beau: Which of your boundaries do you need to break through?

5. Jester: What are you searching for?

6. Yasha: What is worth coming back to?

7. Caduceus: Which path will bring you where your supposed to be?

8. Molly: What do you need tonleave behind to become the person you want to be?

9. The Mighty Nein: How do you connect with people

reblog.comment:

4. Beau: Which of your boundaries do you need to break through?

8. Molly: What do you need tonleave behind to become the person you want to be?

9. The Mighty Nein: How do you connect with people

1. Fjord: How can you learn more about yourself?

3. Nott: What do you want to protect?

4. Beau: Which of your boundaries do you need to break through?

5. Jester: What are you searching for?
